summary: Skyrim werewolves remodelled - now with more badass, more beef and wolfier faces. Think \"WWTA Crinos\" more than \"Bethesda (TM) Scrawny Werebat (R)\". Were-hulk version (brown fur) and a bulky version (brown and gray fur) currently available, ligther version coming soon.
descriptionHtml:
*** UPDATE! ***
Currently contains Hulk-sized mesh and a bulky mesh. Lighter version coming soon. Ish. 
If you don\'t like it, tough. Deal with it.
*******************


Were you annoyed by the crappy looking werewolves in Skyrim just like me? Oh, sure, they look kinda cool and scary, but when you scratch the surface, they\'re more like scrawny were-bats than werewolves. They\'re spindly and thin, with ugly bat-like mugs and huge, silly, pointed ears. And don\'t even get me started on the ape-like fur and skin. In short - they look like someone dressed up a Fallout Deathclaw in an ape suit.

Which is why i\'ve decided to start learning modding on this - a werewolf remodel/retexture that makes the Skyrim weres bigger, bulkier and more badass, with a more wolf-like pelt and a more wolf-like face. It\'s not too pretty, there are issues and seams, there weren\'t enough polys to shape to begin with, but it\'s a start. If you\'re bothered by any of it, just don\'t install it ;)


*** Includes ***
- reshaped base meshes and head
- new normal maps
- new textures

*** Current State ***
- two versions of normals - veiny (standard) and non-veiny (optional download)
- light brown and gray fur version
- hulky and bulky mesh versions

*** To Do ***
- mesh fixes (reshape the pecs and abs, fix lat shape)
- beefed up stats to accompany the beefed up image
- other fur colors
- light-sized mesh
- completely new higher poly mesh

That is all, folks.
author: Orcadude
